Ex1
d)	Endereço de memória	Código máquina	Instrução
	0x00400050		0x34080003	ori $t0,$0,3
	0x00400050		0x34080005	ori $t0,$0,5
	0x00400050		0x3408000a	ori $t0,$0,10
	0x00400050		0x34080001	ori $t0,$0,1
	0x00400050		0x34080014	ori $t0,$0,20

e)	PC		Instrução	$t0		$t1		$t2
	0x00400050	ori $t0,$0,3	0x00000000	0x00000000	0x00000000
	0x00400054	ori $t2,$0,8	0x00000003	0x00000000	0x00000000
	0x00400058	add $t1,$t0,$t0	0x00000003	0x00000000	0x00000008
	0x0040005c	add $t1,$t1,$t2	0x00000003	0x00000006	0x00000008
	0x00400060	jr  $ra		0x00000003	0x0000000e	0x00000008
